paper_abstract: This note discusses three types of solutions for a system of interval-valued fuzzy relational equations with max-T composition and illustrates their relations to the solutions of a system of fuzzy relational inequalities with max-T composition. It validates the major claims appeared in Fuzzy Optimization and Decision Making, 2 (2003) 41-60; 4 (2005) 331-349.
paper_title: A note on solution sets of interval-valued fuzzy relational equations
